articles.author: John Timmer
articles.title: New study: There are lots of icy super-Earths - Ars Technica
articles.description: “Microlensing” lets us find planets at much greater distances from their star.

articles.title: Scientists Found Bird Flu in Dairy Cows – Here’s Why That’s Terrifying - SciTechDaily
articles.description: H5N1 bird flu has now crossed into U.S. dairy cattle for the first time, and alarmingly, it did so through just one spillover from a wild bird. This single event, traced back to Texas in mid-to-late 2023, led to months of undetected cow-to-cow spread across m…
articles.content: A mutated strain of bird flu has made its way into U.S. cattle, spreading rapidly after a single spillover event. The virus adapted for mammalian transmission, leaping across species and states, spar… [+3174 chars]
